price: 71. Y lo salvamos junto con Lot, y los guiamos hacia una tierra (la Gran Siria) que bendijimos para la humanidad.
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
